text: ye to bas sirph naam hee naam hai jo tumane aur tumhaare baap daadaon ne gadh lie hain, khuda ne to isakee koee sanad naazil nahin kee ye log to bas atakal aur apanee nafasaanee khvaahish ke peechhe chal rahe hain haaloki unake paas unake paravaradigaar kee taraph se hidaayat bhee aa chukee hai
